headline: 3 Reasons VTRS is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Viatris’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 33% of its value and falling to $7.69 per share. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
